name: Recalculate
description: Compute values for Redcap calcuate fields by record, event, field, or any combination of. Exposes an API for recalculations too.

authors.name: Adam Nunez
authors.institution: UW Madison - Center for Tobacco Research and Intervention

project-settings.name: By default all users that have access to execute data quality rules have access to the Recalculate EM. If you would like to limit that access further you may define a whitelist of users below. Only users on the whitelist will be able to use the Recalculate EM.

system-settings.name:
Increase Usable Memory:
In MegaBytes (MB). Set PHP's 'memory_limit' to this value when performing recalculations. Useful if a project is reporting a memory issue when using this EM
